snippet.title: Survivor Squad - Trailer
snippet.description:
Now Available on http://www.survivor-squad.com !

Survivor Squad is a Strategy Action game where you control a Squad of up to four survivors and guide them through a highly randomized world looking for supplies to aid you on your journey.

Vote on Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=136428993
Website: http://www.survivor-squad.com
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/EndlessLoopStd
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/EndlessLoopStudios

Thank you for watching!
